title: Rab and His Friends and Other Papers
author: Brown, John
snippet: Brown's celebrated dog John     Pym" is mentioned Their pedigrees are given--here is Puck's,     which shows his "strain" is of the pure azure blood--"Got by     John Pym, out of Tib; bred by Purves of Leaderfoot; sire.

title: Spare Hours
author: Brown, John
snippet: Their pedigrees are given--here is        Puck's, which shows his "strain" is of the pure azure        blood--"Got by John Pym, out of Tib; bred by Purves of        Leaderfoot; sire, Old Dandie, the famous dog of old John        Stoddart of Selkirk--dam, Whin."

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: On crossing the bridge, take the bye-road to the right by the village of Leaderfoot, Gladswood Gate, (Spottiswood, Esq.), and Leader Bridge.
